snippet: While not unexpected, the revocation by the Chinese Catholic Bishops Council is likely to aggravate tensions between Beijing and the Vatican.

byline.contributor: Rachel Donadio contributed reporting from Rome.

lead_paragraph: While not unexpected, the revocation by the Chinese Catholic Bishops Council is likely to aggravate tensions between Beijing and the Vatican.

headline.seo: China Reportedly Strips Shanghai Bishop of His Title
headline.main: China Reportedly Strips Shanghai Bishop of His Title
headline.print_headline: China Reportedly Strips Shanghai Bishop of His Title
